SQL_MODE.SQL: SELECT BRH_ID,BRH_ID||'-'||BRH_NAME as BRH_NAME FROM TBL_BRH_INFO order by BRH_ID
SELECT BANK_BRANCH_ID,BANK_BRANCH_ID||'-'||BANK_BRANCH_NM as BRANCH_NAME FROM TBL_SIGN_BRANCH order by BANK_BRANCH_ID
SELECT ROLE_ID,ROLE_NAME as BRH_NAME FROM TBL_ROLE_INF order by ROLE_ID
SELECT KEY,VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'productId'
SELECT FUNC_ID ,FUNC_NAME FROM TBL_FUNC_INF where FUNC_TYPE = '1' order by FUNC_ID
SELECT MCHNT_TP_GRP,MCHNT_TP_GRP ||' - '||DESCR as DESCR FROM TBL_INF_MCHNT_TP_GRP
SELECT GROUP_MCHT_CD,MCHT_NAME FROM TBL_GROUP_MCHT_INF
SELECT CITY_CODE_NEW,CITY_CODE_NEW ||' - '|| CITY_NAME AS CITY_NAME FROM TBL_CITY_CODE
SELECT KEY,VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'MCHNT_ATTR'
select dest_rsp_code,rsp_code_dsp from tbl_rsp_code_map where dest_rsp_code <> '00' order by dest_rsp_code
SELECT KEY,VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'CERTIFICATE'
SELECT AGENT_NO,AGENT_NM FROM TBL_AGENT_INF
SELECT KEY,VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'BUSINESSTYPE'
SELECT FACTORY_ID,FACTORY_NAME FROM TBL_FACTORY_MANAGEMENT
SELECT TYPE_NO,TYPE_NAME FROM TBL_FACTORY_TYPE
select mcht_no,mcht_no||'-'||mcht_nm from TBL_MCHT_BASE_INF where conn_type = 'X'
select key ,value from cst_sys_param where owner='TermType'
select key ,value from cst_sys_param where owner='PosType'
select key ,value from cst_sys_param where owner='PosSetType'
select key ,value from cst_sys_param where owner='MachineType'
select mchnt_tp_grp ,descr from tbl_inf_mchnt_tp_grp
select mchnt_tp,descr from tbl_inf_mchnt_tp
SELECT KEY,VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'MCHT_E_CD' ORDER BY KEY
SELECT FUNC_ID,FUNC_NAME FROM TBL_FUNC_INF WHERE FUNC_TYPE = '0' ORDER BY FUNC_ID
select * from (select distinct trim(INS_ID_CD) as id,trim(INS_ID_CD)||' - '||trim(CARD_DIS) from TBL_BANK_BIN_INF) order by id
SELECT EMPLOYEE_NUM,NAME FROM TBL_COMPANY_EMPLOYEE WHERE JOB = '0' ORDER BY EMPLOYEE_NUM
SELECT ID,NAME FROM TBL_COMPANY_STEPMENT ORDER BY ID
SELECT ID,AREA_NAME FROM TBL_AREA_INFO WHERE AREA_LEVEL='1' ORDER BY ORDERBY_CONDITION
SELECT EMPLOYEE_NUM,NAME FROM TBL_COMPANY_EMPLOYEE ORDER BY EMPLOYEE_NUM
SELECT FACTORY_ID, FACTORY_NAME FROM TBL_FACTORY_MANAGEMENT ORDER BY FACTORY_ID
SELECT TYPE_NO,TYPE_NAME FROM TBL_FACTORY_TYPE ORDER BY TYPE_NO
SELECT trim(INST_CODE),trim(INST_CODE)||'-'||trim(INST_NAME) as INST_NAME FROM TBL_INS_INF order by INST_CODE
SELECT DISC_CD,DISC_NM FROM TBL_INF_DISC_CD order by DISC_CD

select a.id,c.area_name||b.area_name||a.area_name from tbl_area_info a left join tbl_area_info b on a.parent_id=b.id left join tbl_area_info c on b.parent_id=c.id where a.area_level='5' order by c.area_name||b.area_name||a.area_name
SELECT AGENT_NO,AGENT_NM FROM TBL_AGENT_INF ORDER BY AGENT_NO
SELECT ID,MCHT_LEVEL_NAME FROM TBL_MCHT_LEVEL order by ID
select sa_model_kind ,sa_name from tbl_risk_inf
select sa_model_kind ,sa_model_kind||'-'||sa_name from tbl_risk_inf where sa_type ='0'
select key,value from cst_sys_param where owner = 'ConnType' and key='1'
select key,value from cst_sys_param where owner = 'BankNameCode' AND TYPE='01'
SELECT KEY,VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'GroupFlag'
SELECT KEY,VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'productId'
SELECT KEY,VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'PowSupCode'
SELECT key,value FROM CST_SYS_PARAM where owner = 'POS_TRANSFER_REASON' and key in('5','9')
select KEY,VALUE from CST_SYS_PARAM where owner like '%POS_TRANSFER_REASON%' and key in('4','3')
select KEY,VALUE from CST_SYS_PARAM where owner like '%POS_TRANSFER_REASON%' and key in('1','2')
select key,value from cst_sys_param where owner = 'RecSt'
select key,value from cst_sys_param where owner = 'POS_STATUS'
select BRH_ID,BRH_NAME from TBL_BRH_INFO where BRH_TYPE = '0' and BRH_LEVEL = '1'
select accounted_grp ,accounted_grp||'-'||descr from tbl_ctl_accounted_grp_dtl
select key, key||'-'||value from cst_sys_param where owner = 'SettleChn'
select key, key||'-'||value from cst_sys_param where owner = 'SpeFeeType'
SELECT MIN_TP_GRP,DESCR from TBL_MIN_TP_GRP
select key,value from cst_sys_param where owner = 'IsUse'
select accounted_grp , accounted_grp ||'-'|| descr from tbl_ctl_accounted_grp_dtl order by accounted_grp
select key ,key||'-'|| value from cst_sys_param where owner = 'AccountSeq'
select key ,key||'-'||value from cst_sys_param where owner = 'IsUse'
select key ,key||'-'||value from cst_sys_param where owner = 'ImParam'
select key ,key||'-'||value from cst_sys_param where owner = 'FrozenStat'
select group_mcht_cd,group_mcht_cd||'_'||mcht_name from tbl_group_mcht_inf
SELECT MCHT_NO_GRP_ID,DESCR FROM TBL_MCHT_GRP_INF ORDER BY MCHT_NO_GRP_ID
SELECT DEST_ID_GRP_ID,DESCR FROM TBL_DEST_GRP_INF ORDER BY DEST_ID_GRP_ID
SELECT MCC_GRP_ID,DESCR FROM TBL_MCC_GRP_INF ORDER BY MCC_GRP_ID
SELECT SAL_TP_GRP,DESCR FROM TBL_SAL_TP_GRP ORDER BY MIN_TP_GRP,SAL_TP_GRP
select distinct(issuer_ins),issuer_ins||'-'||substr(descr,0,2) from tbl_inf_kq_tp_grp order by issuer_ins
select key ,key||'-'||value from cst_sys_param where owner = 'ElectBoard'
SELECT KEY,VALUE FROM CST_SYS_PARAM WHERE OWNER = 'productId'
select PAY_ACCT,PAY_ACCT_NM from tbl_pay_account_inf
SELECT SA_MODEL_KIND AS VALUE1,SA_MODEL_KIND AS NAME1 FROM TBL_RISK_INF WHERE SA_TYPE='2' ORDER BY SA_MODEL_KIND
SELECT BANK_GRP_ID,DESCR FROM TBL_BANK_GRP_INF where bank_id_flag='1' ORDER BY BANK_GRP_ID
SELECT BIN_GRP_ID,DESCR FROM TBL_BANKBIN_GRP_INF where bin_id_flag='1' ORDER BY BIN_GRP_ID
SELECT MCHT_NO_GRP_ID,DESCR FROM TBL_MCHT_GRP_INF_N where MCHT_GRP_FLAG ='1' ORDER BY MCHT_NO_GRP_ID
SELECT DEST_ID_GRP_ID,DESCR FROM TBL_DEST_GRP_INF_N ORDER BY DEST_ID_GRP_ID
SELECT trim(INST_CODE),trim(INST_CODE)||'-'||trim(INST_NAME) as INST_NAME FROM TBL_INS_INF_N order by INST_CODE
SELECT trim(STLM_ID),trim(STLM_ID)||'-'||trim(DESCR) as INST_NAME FROM TBL_SETTLE_INS_INF order by STLM_ID
SELECT BANK_GRP_ID,DESCR FROM TBL_BANK_GRP_INF where bank_id_flag='2' ORDER BY BANK_GRP_ID
SELECT BIN_GRP_ID,DESCR FROM TBL_BANKBIN_GRP_INF where bin_id_flag='2' ORDER BY BIN_GRP_ID
SELECT MCHT_NO_GRP_ID,DESCR FROM TBL_MCHT_GRP_INF_N where MCHT_GRP_FLAG ='2' ORDER BY MCHT_NO_GRP_ID
